Package Acquire

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Acquire.Player
public class Player extends Object
The player class for the game. This class holds data relevant to the player and provides ways to modify said data safely and logically.

  • Constructor Summary

    • giveTiles

      public void giveTiles(@NonNull @NonNull Collection<Tile> tileCollection)
      Adds the tiles in the given collection to the player's tile collection
      Parameters:
      tileCollection - to add to the player's already owned collection of tiles
      Throws:
      BufferOverflowException - if the player can not store all tiles in the given collection

    • removeTile

      Removes the given tile from the player
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a boolean representing if the given tile was found and removed or not

      Parameters:
      position - of the tile to remove
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the player does not have a tile with the given position
